events.name: Developing a Complete Downstream Supply Chain for Lithium-Ion Battery Production
events.wd_label: Developing a Complete Downstream Supply Chain for Lithium-Ion Battery Production
events.wd_description: In the process of electrification of the vehicle industry, an more sizeable investment into lithium-ion battery production in order to develop a complete downstream supply chain, including the synthesis of the remaining high-quality battery materials.

events.name: Increasing Employment Rate in the Industry
events.wd_label: Increasing Employment Rate in the Industry
events.wd_description: The development of the EV industry can increase the employment rate in the internal combustion powertrain industry.
events.description: The development of the EV industry can increase the employment rate in the internal combustion powertrain industry.

events.name: Attracting FDI to Raise Necessary Funds for Indonesia
events.wd_label: Attracting FDI to Raise Necessary Funds for Indonesia
events.wd_description: Thanks to FDI, it is possible to inflow resources and technologies that are not available in the country. This is very important for Indonesia, which has limited resources.

events.name: Building Competitive Advantage in the EV Battery Market
events.wd_label: Building Competitive Advantage in the EV Battery Market
events.wd_description: Indonesia cannot allow China to dominate in both relations. events.name: Maintaining Technology Leadership in the EV Industry
events.wd_label: Maintaining Technology Leadership in the EV Industry
events.wd_description: By attracting FDI and building competitive advantage in the EV battery market, Indonesia can maintain technology leadership in the EV industry.
